body:
> IMO, I prefer to use return await, but if it has been bugzilla'd...

Yeah, I agree that `return await` seems clearer. We could override the general mozilla-central eslint rules about this. In this case I don't think it is a good idea though, since this is sort of related to actual execution and not just style.
